fields.summary: iOS: Map annotation, leftView/rightView view child elements do not show up

comments.body: Cannot Reproduce on latest Master (3.1.0) buildHash : 2e0102b72cf70c6f8c79a88709a2fe172b2d973f

The issue is reproducible with 3.0.0.GA but its working fine with below mentioned build.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130313215655
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.2.201302151605
Device: iPad Mini iOS 6.0
